messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your security and your prosperity.

messages.title: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter what you do. We don’t agree.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By voting Conservative with a strong negotiating hand, we can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Seat count significance, tactical voting against Jeremy Corbyn to ensure a stable leadership under Theresa May.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your security and your prosperity.

endorsements.endorsement: If you want to make a real difference, back me by voting for my candidate, Dr Caroline Johnson, in your local constituency of Sleaford and North Hykeham.

images.caption: Theresa May and Dr Caroline Johnson working together for Sleaford and North Hykeham.
A Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
